Package xdi2.core.security.digest.validate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DigestValidator<DIGEST extends Digest>
    A DigestValidator can validate an XDI Digest.
    MDDigestValidator
    This is a DigestValidator that can validate an XDI MDDigest.
    SHADigestValidator
    This is a DigestValidator that can validate an XDI SHADigest.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDigestValidator<DIGEST extends Digest>  
    AbstractMDDigestValidator  
    AbstractSHADigestValidator  
    MDBasicDigestValidator
    This is a MDValidator that validate an XDI MDDigest.
    SHABasicDigestValidator
    This is a SHAValidator that validate an XDI SHADigest.
